name: L1fe 0f a H@ck3r
description:
Note:  This is a work in progress and has quite a few bugs, but I hope you enjoy it so far!

This is a simulation game I created in Twine where the player needed to control a hacker who was trying to flee the country.  

Short of cash, they needed to do small jobs for people while trying to stay safe, manage their health and keep themselves happy under the stress of the situation.

The player's goal is to make enough money, buy their flight ticket and leave the country as quickly as they can. 

Date: October 2020
